pr_title: QFJ-456 - NetworkingOptions should be applied before the socket is connected

timeline.message: applying network options before session is connected

timeline.bodyText: Is there a specific reason to remove the thrown Exception from the method signature? Just asking because it remains on the other methods.
timeline.author: chrjohn

replies.bodyText: Unrelated to the change, but it was highlighted by the IDE as unused for this method. All other methods in this class that declare throws Exception actually do throw some sort of checked exception.
replies.author: the-thing
